categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: Crusher (or Cruncher) was a 150-kilogram male Trandoshan antenna-breaker who had a run-in with Nick Rostu. He was eaten by a dianoga.
Crusher, or Cruncher, was first mentioned retrospectively in Coruscant Nights I: Jedi Twilight a 2008 novel published by Del Rey and written by Michael Reaves.
